name: Z-Sector Zombie Roadkill 0.1
description:
Z-Sector Zombie Roadkill Alpha 0.1

Drive your truck on the zombie infested highway and shoot everything in sight.

Controls
Mouse Left click to shoot

Suggestions and all criticism welcome.
Help me make this game better!

========================================

Z -Sector MMO

Support us on Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/ZSector

These assets are originally from Z-Sector MMO Alpha

I decided to use Z-Sector MMO browser game assets to make this game to help raise awareness, test the assets and test gameplay features. All donations will help support the Post-Apocalyptic top down MMO Z-Sector.

https://www.z-sector.com/
